TopicTitle: Buggy Mod Setup Is Easier To Figure Out Now

Articles.Content:
So I went overboard with the mods... and naturally my build is MEGA unstable.

It's really great now that you can see what mods you have installed and see what is going wrong. If you want to remode just B9 mods you can do, by just moving the B9 folder and testing to see if it fixes it.

Have to say THANK YOU SQUAD. This change has made life a lot easier for us mod junkies. I still find it hard to remove stuff though. LOL
Heavily modded games will probably be much more stable after the mod makers fix some of the bugs that new game updates always cause.
